name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find on Page Pro | Multi-Keyword & Highlight

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and hghlight multiple keywords with custom colors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- find multiple keywords on page
- persist the keywords by domain (so you don't have to keep updating the keyword)
- custom color highlighting for each keyword
